input_text:
Job Title: Associate Procurement Specialist

Location: Omaha, NE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Purchasing, Supply Chain

Description:
Reporting to the Procurement Manager you will be accountable for research, high-level problem resolution, master data analysis, transaction processing and report running. You will collaborate with other business unites to identify process improvement opportunities.

Position Responsibilities

Run different reports on a scheduled basis and provide supporting analyticsManage procurement master data in SAP and right angle to help guide process efficiencies.Enter orders, contracts, and raw material sales orders into SAP based on category strategyBuild relationships with multiple cross-functional contactsSupport business process improvements and documentationProvide research and analytical support for different issues and ad hoc projectsDevelop an understanding of SAP MRP processes and dataDevelop an understanding of market dynamics and cost drivers.Develop an understanding of company facilities and requirements, capabilities, processes, and constraints.


Position Qualifications

Bachelor's degree requiredPrevious intern/work experience in ProcurementExcel – Intermediate levelContinuous improvement mindset and methodologyIn the office 3 days per week, Tuesday - ThursdayAt this time, we require applicants for this role to be legally authorized to work in the United States without requiring employer sponsorship either now or in the future.


Our Benefits

We care about your total well-being and will support you with the following, subject to your location and role:

Health: Medical, dental and vision insurance, company-paid life, accident and disability insuranceWealth: great pay, incentive opportunity, matching 401(k) and stock purchase planGrowth: online courses, virtual and classroom development experiencesBalance: paid-time off, parental leave, flexible work-schedules (subject to your location and role)


Our Company

Conagra Brands is one of North America's leading branded food companies. We have a rich heritage of making great food, and a team that’s passionate about innovation and growth. Conagra offers choices for every occasion through iconic brands, such as Birds Eye®, Marie Callender's®, Banquet®, Healthy Choice®, Slim Jim®, Reddi-wip®, and Vlasic®, and emerging brands, including Angie's® BOOMCHICKAPOP®, Duke's®, Earth Balance®, Gardein®, and Frontera®.

We pride ourselves on having the most impactful, energized and inclusive culture in the food industry. For more information, visit www.conagrabrands.com.

Conagra Brands is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, color, religion, ethnic or national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, pregnancy, leave status, disability, veteran status, genetic information and/or any other characteristic or status protected by national, federal, state or local law.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
